subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury, guarded closely by Miami’s Jason Williams, badly misfired on a desperation 3-point try as the clock ran down, and the Heat took its first victory of the season.
snippet: Stephon Marbury, guarded closely by Miami’s Jason Williams, badly misfired on a desperation 3-point try as the clock ran down, and the Heat took its first victory of the season.
